level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see ยง 8 of Department of Health Functions Clarification Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-60, June 6, 2001, 48 DCR 5701).
For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see ยง 4408 of Fiscal Year 2002 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-124, August 3, 2001, 48 DCR 7861).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-28
level.text: For Law 14-28, see notes following ยง 7-219.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority Pursuant to the Department of Health Functions Clarification Act of 2001 to Regulate Barber Shops, Beauty Salons, and Massage and Spa Establishments, see Mayor's Order 2006-10, January 27, 2006 (53 DCR 2711a).
Delegation of Authority under D.C. Law 14-28, the Department of Health Functions Clarification Act of 2001, see Mayor's Order 2006-34, March 12, 2006 (53 DCR 5073).

level.heading: Resolutions
level.text: Resolution 15-510, the "Air Quality Control Regulation Implementing Sections 182 and 185 of the Federal Clean Air Act Emergency Approval Resolution of 2004", was approved effective April 4, 2004.

Resolution 15-512, the "Air Quality Control Regulation Implementing the Severe Area Non-attainment Requirements of the Federal Clean Air Act Emergency Approval Resolution of 2004", was approved effective April 4, 2004.
